attributes.action: Legalise cannabis and also to speak of all benefits in the house of commons
attributes.additional_details: Please use the world wide Web and have a look at the thousands of reports,studies and scientific evidence to prove that cannabis has the power to save life's
attributes.background: I want all to research and look at he benefits of legalising cannabis, the US have started this journey with so many benefits to the community and to help locals of said state producing cannabis, the medical side of cannabis is almost limitles so before you ignore or sign please research it yourself
